so_21042534: Get/extract the data from log file of last 3 minutes?
Top-3 Scripts:
so_21042534: awk \
-v start="$(date +"%F %R" --date=@$(expr `date +%s` - 180))" \
-v end="$(date "+%F %R")" \
'$0 ~ start, $0 ~ end' \
agent.log

Explanations about Options.--date: display time described by STRING, not 'now'

Top-3 Scripts:
ul_241165: REGEX="^\($DAYS\) "
REGEX=$(printf "%s" "$REGEX" | sed -e 's/\([|]\)/\\\1/g')

grep "$REGEX" logfile.txt
